title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions: Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" - the perfect travel companion for your next trip! This lightweight hardside suitcase is designed for convenience and durability. With a sleek ABS hard shell and steel rod construction, this suitcase is built to last. The 360 degree silent double spinner wheels make navigating airports and crowded spaces a breeze. Available in a variety of stylish colors, this suitcase is as fashionable as it is functional. The TSA lock provides added security, while the spacious interior features mesh zip pockets and elasticated compartments for easy organization. Don't settle for just any luggage - travel in style with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20"!

Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20"! This sleek and stylish hardside suitcase is perfect for your next 1-3 day trip. Available in a variety of vibrant colors such as Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, this suitcase is not only fashionable but also highly functional.

Crafted from durable ABS hard shell and a steel rod frame, this carry-on luggage is designed to withstand impact and resist scratches, ensuring your belongings stay safe and secure during travel. The 360-degree silent double spinner wheels make maneuvering through busy airports a breeze, while the TSA lock provides added security and peace of mind.

With a spacious 33L capacity and a lightweight design weighing only 5.62lb, you'll have plenty of room for all your essentials without worrying about exceeding weight limits. The interior features a mesh zip pocket, elasticated straps, and a full capacity design to keep your belongings organized and secure.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to travel in style and convenience with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20". Upgrade your travel experience today!
